description: Made from 100% recycled fabric, this technical tee features a custom mountain print and a casual, round-neck style perfect for a range of activities or kicking back at the end of the day. The tee is optimised for your comfort with low-bulk seams and a soft next-to-skin feel. Made from quick-drying fabric with an odour control finish, it will keep you fresh throughout the day.
name: Rab Mantle Mountain Tee - Mens
